mapper.select: select m.id, m.url, m.name, m.parentId from menu m where m.id in (select mr.`mid` from user_role u_r, menu_role mr where u_r.`roleid` = mr.`rid` and u_r.`userid` = #{userId}) and m.enabled = true;
select mr.mid from menu_role mr where mr.rid = #{rid};

select m1.`id`, m1.`name`, m2.`id` as id2, m2.`name` as name2, m3.`id` as id3, m3.`name` as name3 from menu m1, menu m2, menu m3 where m1.`id` = m2.`parentId` and m2.`id` = m3.`parentId` and m3.`enabled` = true
